ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Assuredly guidance is up to Us
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is indeed for Us to show the way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely it is for Us to show the Right Way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Surely, in Our hands is guidance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, on Us is (to give) guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Ours is it to show the way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely upon Us rests the guidance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Ours it is (to give) the guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, it is for Us to provide guidance --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verify on us is the guidance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily We take upon Ourselves to guide,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! Ours it is (to give) guidance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is upon Us to guide.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:12] Truly with Us lies [all] guidance, the pointing out of the path of guidance from that of error, so that Our command may be followed by adhering to the former [manner of conduct] and that Our prohibition [may also be heeded] by refraining from falling into the latter [manner of conduct].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Ours it is (to give) the guidance) it is for Us to show what is good and what is evil
